targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (9)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (10)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (8)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (5,6,11)--(4)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (10,8,5,6,11, 9) --(1,3,4,7)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (1,2)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
where b.id_resolutorio in (SELECT a.id FROM gestion.resolutorio a where   id_categoria  in (10,8,9,6,11))--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598,354,597,563,566,599,503) 
and b.principal is true
--and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
where b.id_resolutorio in (SELECT a.id FROM gestion.resolutorio a where   id_categoria  in (10,8,9,6,11))--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598,354,597,563,566,599,503) 
and b.principal is true
--and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (6)
and a.verificado is null 
and (a.feedback < 3 or a.feedback is null)

SELECT count(a.id)
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso

and b.principal is true
--and d.active = 1
and d.id_estatus in (6)
and (a.feedback >= 3   or  a.verificado = 'SI')

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::Decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
                                           FROM gestion.caso a
                                           inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
                                           inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
                                           where b.id_resolutorio in (SELECT a.id FROM gestion.resolutorio a where   id_categoria  in (10,8,9,6,11))--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598,354,597,563,566,599,503)
                                           and b.principal is true
                                           --and d.active = 1
                                           and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::Decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso 
where b.id_resolutorio in (SELECT a.id FROM gestion.resolutorio a where   id_categoria  in (10,8,9,6,11))--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598,354,597,563,566,599,503)

-- Porcentaje de Eficiencia Casos Cerrados
SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (-- Casos Recibidos
                                            SELECT count(a.id)
                                            FROM gestion.caso a
                                            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
                                            inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso =  d.id_caso
                                            where b.id_resolutorio in (SELECT a.id FROM gestion.resolutorio a where   id_categoria  in (10))--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
                                            and b.principal is true
                                            --and d.active = 1
                                            and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) )::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
FROM gestion.caso a
inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
where b.id_resolutorio in (SELECT a.id FROM gestion.resolutorio a where   id_categoria  in (10))--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)

-- Total de Casos por Estado
 select 
	b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from 
	gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
   inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
	 where  a.id_sub_categoria in (1,8,5,6,11,9) --(1,3,4,7) --and d.active = 1 
	 and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS EN EL SISTEMA

targets.rawSql:
-- Total de Casos por Estado
 select 
	b.nombre as estado, count(a.id) as total
    from 
	gestion.caso a
	 inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
   inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
	 where  a.id_sub_categoria in (10,8,5,6,11,9)--(1,3,4,7) --and d.active = 1 
	 and d.id_estatus in (6)
    group by estado
    order by total desc
    Limit 10;

panels.title: ESTADOS CON MAYOR NUMERO DE CASOS ATENDIDO

targets.rawSql:
--Total de Casos por Fecha
select to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YYYY') as fecham, to_char(a.fecha, 'YYYY-mm-dd') as fechao, count(a.fecha) as total
		from gestion.caso a
			inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
		where  a.fecha > CAST(now()::timestamp AS DATE) - CAST('15 days' AS INTERVAL) and 
		a.id_sub_categoria in (10,8,5,6,11,9)--(1,3,4,7) and d.active = 1 
		and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
			group by fecham, fechao
			order by fechao

panels.title: HISTÓRICO DE CASOS RECIBIDO EN EL SISTEMA DESDE LA VENAPP (ÚLTIMOS DÍAS)

title: Cartelera VicePresidencia de los Servicios V3
